body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Adam Wood and the customer's name is Diane Washington.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Adam Wood, and I represent Quick Cash Pawn Shop. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Adam, I'm Diane Washington. I have a question about your privacy policies.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Diane! We take your privacy very seriously. Can you tell me what specific concerns you have?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm worried about how my personal information will be used.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern. To ensure we can help you properly, could you please provide your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's January fifteenth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Diane. One more piece of information I need is your zip code.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My zip code is one zero zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that. Your privacy is important to us, and we will never share your information without your consent.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That makes me feel a lot better. Thank you for clarifying!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: No problem at all! Thank you for your time, Diane. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out.
